entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Owen Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:01 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -5.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 12:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -5.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -6.7°C
Wind: ESE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning early in the morning and ending late in the afternoon then 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. 60 percent chance of snow before morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the evening then becoming northeast 20 before morning. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
